item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: How to Make Tomato Basil Soup
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Make Tomato Basil Soup in Disney Dreamlight Valley
  • How to Get the Ingredients for Tomato Basil Soup in DDV

Disney Dreamlight Valley is an incredible life simulation game developed by Gameloft that takes Disney and Pixar fans on a nostalgic ride. In the game, players live in a beautiful valley with iconic heroes and villains. Together, you complete many different tasks and try to solve the mystery of the Forgetting that has ruined the valley.

With around 310 recipes, cooking is a favorite activity for many players in Disney Dreamlight Valley . Tomato Basil Soup is a new appetizer introduced in A Rift In Time expansion. This delicious soup restores a decent amount of energy and can also be sold at Goofy’s Stall. This guide will help you learn how to make Tomato Basil Soup in Disney Dreamlight Valley.

How to Make Tomato Basil Soup in Disney Dreamlight Valley

You’ll only need two ingredients to make this tasty soup:

  • Tomato
  • Basil.

How to Get the Ingredients for Tomato Basil Soup in DDV

Tomatoes

First, you need a tomato for the recipe. You can get tomatoes from Dazzle Beach , one of the early-game biomes in the game. Go to this biome and repair Goofy’s stall, then upgrade it twice for 1,000 and 2,000 Star Coins. Once upgraded, Dreamers will be able to buy Tomato Seeds from Goofy for eight Star Coins each.

Next, you will need to plant and water the tomato seeds, then wait 25 minutes for them to grow. Once they're ready, simply pick them up from the ground. If you are short on time, you also have the option to buy ripe tomatoes for 33 Star Coins each. Like other biomes in Dreamlight Valley, Dazzle Beach is locked initially, and gamers will have to spend 1,000 Dreamlight in order to access it. This vegetable-type ingredient is used in many delicious recipes, such as Club Sandwich, Greek Pizza, Veggie Pasta, and more.

Basil

Basil is a dark green herb found in the Peaceful Meadow region. It grows on the ground, and once found, you can simply pick it up.

This spice type ingredient can be sold at Goofy’s stall for 50 Star Coins, and it’s a part of many tasty meals like Basil Berry Salad, Basil Omelet, Fish Streak, etc. Once you collect all the ingredients, go to any nearby Cooking Station and put Tomato and Basil in the pot. Next, start the cooking process using one coal. Once ready, consume this tasty soup to regain 255 energy or sell it for 93 Star Coins at Goofy’s Stall.

item.title: 10 Best Football Manager Games In 3D Match Engine, Ranked
item.description:
Highlights

  • Football Manager by Sports Interactive offers a unique soccer management experience.
  • The game's 3D Match Engine has evolved over the years, enhancing realism and gameplay.
  • Each edition introduces new features and improvements, making it one of the best soccer management games available.

Among the most popular soccer games on the market, Football Manager by Sports Interactive stands out from its competitors. In this game, players do not control the athletes on the field during matches - as they do in EA Sports FC or eFootball - but rather assume the role of managers who oversee the entire club, organizing training sessions, transfers, and match tactics.

Additionally, one of the franchise's major innovations introduced in 2009 was the game's 3D Match Engine, which allowed matches to be played out more dynamically. For the 2025 edition, SI Games plans to update the engine to Unity, marking the end of a legacy of great Football Manager versions. These enhancements make it one of the best soccer management games available.

10 Football Manager 2009

The Beginning Of The 3d Era

  • Release Date: November 14, 2008

The 2009 edition of Football Manager was a milestone for the franchise, introducing players to its new 3D graphics engine. Being the first time SI Games implemented these changes and having been released over a decade ago, the game is somewhat clunky and lacks the fluidity of more recent editions. However, it was a significant change for its time, solidifying it as one of the top soccer manager games.

Furthermore, Football Manager 09 also introduced other elements that became key to the franchise. For the first time, female managers could be created, and press conferences were introduced, where players could answer various questions from journalists, enhancing immersion and providing a more authentic manager experience.

9 Football Manager 2013

Minor Redesigns Enhanced The Experience

  • Release Date: November 2, 2012

The release of Football Manager 2013 was filled with new features for fans of the franchise. The main changes aimed to make gameplay faster, especially for those players who wanted to quickly reach match day. Called Football Manager Classic , this option streamlined various player management processes.

Another new addition this year was the Challenge Mode, which placed players in different scenarios that needed to be resolved within half a season, testing each player's skills in the game. Although many preferred to stick with the traditional gameplay, it was a good addition for those looking for something different in their save.

8 Football Manager 2014

Significant Overhaul To The Tactical System

  • Release Date: October 30, 2013

In addition to the standard minor enhancements to the game's 3D engine, such as improved player AI and better lighting, Football Manager 2014 introduced significant changes to the tactical system, marking it as one of the best Football Manager games for advanced strategy enthusiasts.

Instructions were now more complex, mirroring how coaches would give instructions to players in real life. While this brought Football Manager closer to realism, some players struggled to adapt to these changes. Ultimately, the game was a success, selling over one million copies.

7 Football Manager 2018

Updated With The Dynamics System

  • Release Date: November 10, 2017

The primary change in Football Manager 2018 was the addition of the Dynamics system, where managers could better understand what was happening in the minds of their players. This tool was useful for understanding what was affecting each player's morale, making it one of the top soccer management games for player interactions.

This system also displayed the influence of each player within the squad, with social groups forming among them, potentially leading to issues if the squad was not well-managed. However, if managers could effectively control each player's ego, the results would be positive in the long run, with the team functioning more cohesively.

6 Football Manager 2019

Tactical Changes And Introduction Of VAR

  • Release Date: November 2, 2018

VAR began to be incorporated into major European soccer leagues during the 17-18 season. Therefore, for Football Manager 2019 , one of SI Games' innovations was adding this system to the game. Like in real-life sports, this element received mixed reactions from fans, but it solidified this edition as one of the best versions of Football Manager for realistic match experiences.

However, the main innovations were related to tactical elements, the core aspect of the game. Now, tactics needed to be thought of in three phases: possession, transition, and out-of-possession. This became vital for club success and allowed players to have greater control over how teams behaved in each game phase.

5 Football Manager 2020

Improved Offensive Movements

  • Release Date: November 18, 2019

In Football Manager 2020 , Club Vision was introduced, which changed the game beyond the meeting room. This new feature is divided into three parts: club culture, ongoing objectives, and a five-year plan. These elements are dynamic and change as the player progresses in the game, making it one of the best soccer management games for long-term planning.

Moreover, Football Manager 2020 brought improvements to the engine. Human models were updated for more realistic anatomy, with clothes moving more naturally. Fields now react to weather, and lighting was improved with more natural shading.

4 Football Manager 2021

New Metrics For Evaluating Players

One of the major innovations in Football Manager 2021 was the update to the Match Engine AI, making actions on the field more unpredictable and fluid. Players could now adjust their decisions as the game developed, while defenders reacted more intelligently to offensive movements.

Additionally, the game's interface was redesigned, and graphics were more detailed. Another highlight was the introduction of the match analysis system, with advanced metrics such as Expected Goals (xG). These additions provided a deeper insight into team performance, allowing for more informed and precise tactical decisions - establishing it as one of the top Football Manager games for analytical gamers.

3 Football Manager 2022

Players With More Freedom On The Field

  • Release Date: November 8, 2021

In Football Manager 2022 , the animations were revamped, separating 3D from the 2D engine, allowing for more freedom in creating animations. This change improved player movements, making actions more realistic. Additionally, the new game engine enhanced match AI, optimizing decision-making, such as when to dribble or pass, and introducing a more intelligent pressing system, marking it as one of the best versions for tactical diversity.

Another major addition was the new "Wide Centre-Back" position, allowing central defenders to play wider, supporting the midfield like full-backs. This brought more tactical versatility to the game, catering to different play styles and strategic needs of managers.

2 Football Manager 2023

UEFA Competitions Arrive In SI Games' Title

  • Release Date: November 8, 2022

Football Manager 2023 brought a greater sense of occasion to UEFA competition days, with official branding and custom backgrounds enhancing immersion. European competitions now feature props, realistic trophies, and official anthems before matches.

For this edition, improvements were made to AI managers so that the tactical choices of other teams better reflected their qualities. Another focus was on team defense, with new instructions added, allowing more defensive formations to also achieve higher success rates, making it one of the best football management games for defensive strategies.

1 Football Manager 2024

The Definitive Edition Of This Era

Over the years, SI Games' engine has undergone various changes and enhancements, making Football Manager 2024 the definitive edition. Player animations in the 3D engine have become more fluid, while rewritten ball physics make matches more realistic for viewers.

Besides these changes and the addition of the Japanese League, another feature that pleased players was the new Set Pieces system, giving managers more control over how teams acted in free kicks, corners, and throw-ins, making these plays even more dangerous. This ensures it remains one of the top soccer management games for set-piece enthusiasts.

item.title: Shadow of the Erdtree: Every New Crystal Tear Location
item.description:
One of Elden Ring 's most interesting mechanics is the Flask of Wondrous Physick . With the wide range of potential benefits offered by Crystal Tears , it's not surprising that Shadow of the Erdtree builds on the mechanic, adding 8 incredibly unique new Crystal Tears for players to experiment with. Like the base game, these new tears are specialized to target and enhance a specific gameplay element, such as the attack power of Spirit Summons. This guide will show players how to find all 8 new Crystal Tears in the Elden Ring DLC , and explain exactly how they are meant to be used.

All New Crystal Tears in Shadow of the Erdtree

All 8 Crystal Tears in Shadow of the Erdtree are acquired by defeating the various Furnace Golems around the map. If you are struggling to defeat them, try Game Rant's Furnace Golem boss guide .

Crystal Tear

Effect

Location

Deflecting Hardtear

  • Temporarily enhances spontaneous guard

  • Defeat the Furnace Golem near the Scorched Ruins in Gravesite Plain

Crimsonburst Dried Tear

  • Steadily restores HP of nearby allies for a time.

  • Found at the small camp that is just south of Shadow Keep in Scadu Altus.

Oil-Soaked Tear

  • Coats nearby enemies in Oil

  • Found in lower Scadu Altus, south of the Ruins of Unte. You'll need to use the secret path through the Shadow Keep sewers to reach the Castle Watering Hole site of grace. The Furnace Golem will be found among several inactive golems, but as you approach, it will come to life.

Bloodsucking Cracked Tear

  • Enhances attacks at the cost of HP.

  • This is the second Furnace Golem in lower Scadu Altus. This time, you'll need to throw a Hefty Furnace Pot into the basket of the inactive Furnace Golem that is blocking the entrance to the Ruins of Unte. It will activate, allowing the fight to commence.

Cerulean-Sapping Cracked Tear

  • Grants attacks FP-restoring effect.

  • East of the Cathedral of Manus Metyr, you'll find an Armored Furnace Golem that drops this tear upon defeat. You'll need access to the Hefty Fire Pot, which you'll throw into the basket from the higher ledge you reach via Spiritspring.

Viridian Hidden Tear

  • Eliminate all stamina consumption.

  • The Furnace Golem that drops this tear is found along the path to the Southern Shores . As you head southeast from the Ellac River Downstream site of grace, you'll reach the section that appears to come out from beneath Gravesite Plain on the map. There will be several Lightning Rams in the area. The golem is found near the end of the river, right before the waterfall.

Crimson-Sapping Cracked Tear

  • Grants attacks HP-restoring effect.

  • The Furnace Golem that drops this tear is found in the Ancient Rauh Ruins. From the Rauh Ancient Ruins, East site of grace, head west across the bridge. The Furnace Golem will be at the other end, in a large pool of water.

Glovewart Crystal Tear

  • Enhances attacks of spirits.

  • Head to the eastern edge of Charo's Hidden Grave to find the Armored Furnace Golem that drops this Crystal Tear. Just as with the previous armored golem, you'll need to use Hefty Fire Pots to take it down.

Players needing to get the Hefty Furnace Pot recipe will need the Greater Potentate's Cookbook 2 , which is found at the Run-Down Traveler's Rest beneath the Ellac Greatbridge in Gravesite Plain. To get the Hefty Fire Pot , you'll need to find Greater Potentate's Cookbook 1, found at the Scorched Ruins in Gravesite Plain.

item.title: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster Has Controversial Feature on PC
item.description:
Highlights

  • Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster to include Denuvo DRM, causing concern for PC players.
  • Recent incidents with Denuvo have raised concerns about accessibility and ownership issues.
  • New Denuvo technology may be on the way, potentially improving the experience for players.

Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster on PC will be coming out with the controversial Denuvo, which may cause some concern for fans of the series. The Dead Rising franchise in itself has a huge following stemming from all four mainline games and its spin-offs, as well as the lesser-known movies. While the Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster may have made fans excited, the discovery that Denuvo will be present may be an issue.

As the trailers and information for the upcoming Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster have confirmed that the game will come to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC, many fans have been scouring all available news regarding the title. While the bonuses and new mechanics seem to be a hit for many gamers, some PC players may be having second thoughts just because of the inclusion of Denuvo.

Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster 's Steam page confirms that the game will incorporate the third-party DRM Denuvo. While developers think highly of the software due to the safety Denuvo provides, recent incidents involving other games which use the technology have raised some concerns about whether the security measures it provides limit the accessibility and ownership of players whenever issues arise with Denuvo's servers. With the game releasing on September 19, 2024, it will be just a few months to find out how Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster 's playability will be affected by the Denuvo. Other gamers have reported their negative experiences like slowdown and lagging from other games which use the security measure.

Some Capcom Games Which Have Previously Used Denuvo

  • Resident Evil Village
  • Street Fighter 6

Outside of Capcom, one such instance was when Persona 5 Royal was rendered unplayable in early May. While Denuvo claimed that there were no server outages at the time, many fans lashed out and blamed the anti-piracy software for the inability to play the title. While temporary fixes such as launching the title without online functionality would allow access, many players believed that the makeshift workaround was not a solution. Offline playing limits certain features of each game, and this might cause some dissatisfaction for those who want to experience their games fully.

However, previous reports state that there may be new Denuvo technology coming soon. It hasn't been stated how different it will be from the existing software, but some fans are hopeful that it will cause fewer problems than before. Granted, issues from the server side of things also have to be addressed first. Whether Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster will use existing or new Denuvo technology hasn't been confirmed yet, but some fans are expressing concern about how it may affect their experience. Hopefully, by the time the game releases, the experience will be smooth so that players don't turn on Capcom and Dead Rising .

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: How to Make Sand Worm Carpaccio Plate
item.description:
Gameloft’s adventure life sim, Disney Dreamlight Valley, allows players to enter a magical world full of Disney and Pixar characters. This game is a treat for Disney lovers as they get a chance to play along with their favorite heroes and villains, cook delicious food, mine, fish, craft items, and do many fun tasks.

players need energy to complete regular activities in the game, like gardening, fishing, and mining. Eating meals is a great way to get this energy. Sand Worm Carpaccio Plate is a tasty two-star appetizer added with the in A Rift in Time expansion. Follow this guide to learn how to make Sand Worm Carpaccio Plate in Disney Dreamlight Valley .

How to Make Sand Worm Carpaccio Plate

Dreamers will only need two ingredients to cook this two-star meal:

  • Sand Worm
  • Melon

Sand Worm

The first thing you’ll need to make this recipe is the Sand Worm. It’s a unique fish found in the Glittering Dunes biome in Eternity Isle. To obtain it, head to a sand pool for fishing in any of these three regions:

  • The Plains
  • The Wastes
  • The Borderlands.

Once you are there, look for orange ripples in the sand pool and cast your line. Glittering Dunes is initially locked, so you'll need to complete Jafar’s quest, The Sands In the Hourglass, to access it. The Plains area is free, but you'll need 4,000 Mists to enter The Wastes and 10,000 Mists for The Borderlands. The recipe only requires one Sand Worm, so if you catch extra, you can sell each one for 800 Star Coins at the Goofy’s Stall or store it for future use.

Melon

Melon is the second ingredient that you need to get to make the meal. This fruit-type ingredient is available to purchase at the Goofy’s shop in The Plains area of the Glittering Dunes.

As mentioned above, this area is unlocked by default, so fast travel there, go to Goofy’s Stall, and spend 40 Star Coins to get melon seeds. Plant the seeds and wait 30 minutes for them to grow. Apart from the Sand Worm Carpaccio Plate, melons are also used to make Melon Boba Tea.

With both of the ingredients in your backpack, head to a cooking station and toss the Sand Worm and melon into the cooking pot. And yes, you will also need one coal to start cooking. Once the Sand Worm Carpaccio Plate is ready, you can eat it to replenish 3,004 energy or sell it at Goofy’s shop for 1,160 Star Coins.
